content:
You're right on the same wavelength as me! I think a festival with a mix of indie, folk, and alternative music would be an amazing fit for me. I love the idea of a laid-back atmosphere and discovering new artists. That sounds like the perfect way to spend a weekend.

Yes, please do share some specific recommendations! I'd love to hear about festivals that fit this description. Are there any particular festivals that you think I might enjoy?

Also, what makes a festival a good fit for someone who enjoys a laid-back atmosphere and discovering new artists? Is it the size of the festival, the type of music, the venue, or something else entirely?

Let me know, and thanks again for the recommendations!
